header.description: Constantly learning something new and diving deeper into topics that I'm already familiar with. I work mainly with MERN stack. Also doing my best to add German language to it.

about.title: About

p1.part3: . It was a pretty intense five months of learning under the supervision of a mentor. However, it wasn't my first contact with coding.

p2.part1: Before that I worked as a volleyball scout. My daily tasks were mainly focused on gathering information about other teams using a special software (Data Volley) where all games are represented in simple code form. It's a pretty powerful software, but I was missing some features, so I started learning
p2.part2: to get a bit more out of these files and make some changes to them automatically.

p3.part1: That wasn't my first exposure to programming either. Prior to that, I had studied
p3.part4: as the leading programming language. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to continue due to the demands of my job at the time, but I am considering going back.

about.p4: So, even though I have had a couple of approaches to programming, I have never seriously tried to make it my career until now. This time I have decided to go all in!

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.entry1: Full-Time on site coding bootcamp covering 840h of practical project based work in SCRUM methodology.
experience.entry2: A game analyst who uses self-built Python tools in his daily work to present data to the team in a better and more readable way.
